markdownRemark.html: A notable takeaway from Dave Wascha’s 20 Years of Product Management in 25 Minutes is that companies often loose sight of their own mission and beging to solve their own problems as opposed to solving their customers’ problems.

frontmatter.title: Curiosity and Why JSX Requires React in Scope
